MS MCQs

    Create tokens using OpenZeppelin

    »

    1. What is the most complete definition of blockchain tokens?

      They represent currency that can be traded.

      They represent digital assets that have some value and are tradeable.

      They are physical tokens that can be used to trade on a blockchain network.

      They are unique assets that identify ownership.


    2. What type of token is most commonly used solely for non-fungible assets?

      ERC20

      ERC777

      ERC1155

      ERC721


    3. What modular, robust, and reusable tool does OpenZeppelin provide to make it easier to write secure code?

      CLI

      SDK

      Contracts library

      Test Helpers
